audioText: Je reverrai probablement ma cousine l'année prochaine lors du mariage de notre grand-mère qui célébrera ses quatre-vingts ans.
question: When will the speaker likely see their cousin again?
options: Next year at their grandmother's anniversary celebration
This weekend at a family dinner
At Christmas with the extended family
explanation: The text states 'Je reverrai probablement ma cousine l'année prochaine lors du mariage de notre grand-mère qui célébrera ses quatre-vingts ans.' - 'I will probably see my cousin again next year at our grandmother's wedding who will be celebrating her eightieth birthday.' The future form 'reverrai' comes from 'revoir' (to see again).
